text: This is the moment comedian George Lopez filmed himself'urinating'on President Donald Trump's star on the Hollywood walk of fame - but the footage is not all as it seems. The comedian was seen crouching next to the brass plaque on Hollywood Boulevard as a stream of water flowed from between his legs in the video published on Wednesday by TMZ. However, on closer inspection Lopez - whose face was scrunched up in a mock grimace - was carrying a small bottle of water which he was using to mimic the act. The comedian was seen crouching next to the brass plaque on Hollywood Boulevard as a stream of water flowed from between his legs in the video published on Wednesday Lopez is well known for his jibes against the President and was last year booed off stage at a charity gala in Denver
